title: Successful Windows Installer Installation
description: Verify that the Windows installer installs the application correctly with all dependencies and creates desktop and Start Menu shortcuts.

steps.description: Run the Windows installer with default options on a clean Windows environment.
Check installation completes without errors.
Verify desktop shortcut is created.
Verify Start Menu shortcut is created.
Launch the application through shortcuts.
Application launches successfully without internet connection.

title: Clean Uninstallation
description: Verify that the uninstaller removes all application files and shortcuts without data loss.

steps.description: Trigger uninstallation via Windows Programs and Features.
Verify all application files are removed.
Verify desktop and Start Menu shortcuts are removed.
Verify no user data remains if user opted for complete uninstall.

title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify user can authenticate with default or updated credentials and maintain session integrity.

steps.description: Launch application and navigate to login screen.
Input valid default username and password.
Submit login form.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard.
Close and relaunch application.
Verify user session is maintained or user is prompted to login again, based on session management policy.

title: User Authentication Failure
description: Verify authentication failure for invalid credentials and appropriate error messaging.

steps.description: Launch application and navigate to login screen.
Input invalid username or password.
Submit login form.
Verify authentication fails and error message is displayed.

title: Password Update Functionality
description: Verify user can update password successfully and use new password in subsequent logins.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Navigate to settings and initiate password update.
Input current password and new valid password.
Submit password change.
Verify password update confirmation is shown.
Logout and attempt login with old password.
Verify login fails with old password.
Login with new password.
Verify login succeeds with new password.

title: Lead CRUD Operations
description: Verify full Create, Read, Update, Delete operations work correctly via leads management API and UI, with data persistence in PostgreSQL backend.

steps.description: Login and navigate to leads management interface.
Create a new lead with valid data.
Verify new lead is shown in leads list and persisted in backend.
Edit the newly created lead, changing multiple fields.
Verify lead updates are saved and reflected in UI and database.
Perform a read/search operation to locate the updated lead.
Verify the lead record is accurately retrieved.
Delete the lead.
Verify the lead is removed from UI and database.

title: Bulk Operations on Leads
description: Verify ability to select multiple leads and perform bulk actions such as deletion and status updates.

steps.description: Create multiple leads to have bulk selection options.
Select multiple leads from leads list.
Perform bulk status update.
Verify statuses are updated for all selected leads in UI and database.
Select multiple leads again.
Perform bulk delete.
Verify all selected leads are deleted from UI and database.

title: Advanced Search and Filtering with Debounce
description: Verify search and filter functionality works correctly with debounce and filter memoization for performance;

steps.description: Populate leads list with at least 500 leads with varying attributes.
Input search query in search box continuously (simulate typing).
Verify search results update only after debounce delay.
Apply various filter combinations repeatedly.
Verify filtering results are cached, providing fast response times.

title: Virtual Scrolling Performance
description: Verify virtual scrolling supports smooth scrolling performance achieving ~60fps with 1000+ leads loaded.

steps.description: Load UI with dataset of over 1000 leads.
Scroll through the leads list continuously from top to bottom.
Verify scrolling is smooth with no lag or freezing.
Monitor frame rate to verify it approaches 60fps.

title: Import Lead Data from Excel/CSV with Password Protection
description: Verify user can import lead data from password-protected .xlsx, .xls, and .csv files without errors, including handling large datasets.

steps.description: Prepare password-protected valid Excel and CSV files with lead data including large datasets (>1000 rows).
Import password-protected .xlsx file.
Verify data is imported correctly without errors.
Import password-protected .xls file.
Verify data is imported correctly without errors.
Import password-protected .csv file.
Verify data is imported correctly without errors.
Import file with incorrect password.
Verify operation fails gracefully with meaningful error message.

title: Export Lead Data with Password Protection
description: Verify lead data export functions properly creating password-protected Excel/CSV files and data integrity is maintained.

steps.description: Select leads or entire dataset to export.
Trigger export operation to generate Excel or CSV file with user-defined password protection.
Verify exported file is password protected.
Open exported file using valid password.
Verify lead data in exported file matches selected data.

title: Offline Operation Without Internet
description: Verify that after installation, the application works fully offline with all core features functioning and no internet dependency.

steps.description: Install application and disconnect from internet.
Launch the application and authenticate.
Verify login succeeds using local authentication.
Perform lead CRUD operations, search/filter, import/export, and bulk operations.
Verify all operations succeed without internet connectivity.

title: Local Data Encryption Verification
description: Verify data stored locally is encrypted and secure, and audit trails are logged correctly.

steps.description: Create and edit several leads to generate local data.
Verify local database/files are encrypted using expected encryption mechanism.
Access local storage files directly.
Verify no sensitive data is easily readable or exposed in plain text.
Generate actions that trigger audit trail logging.
Verify audit trails are properly recorded and accessible in audit logs.

title: Security: Penetration Test for Export Password Protection
description: Verify that password protection for exported files withstands common penetration attempts and brute force scenarios.

steps.description: Export lead data with password protection enabled.
Attempt to bypass or crack password using penetration testing tools.
Verify that password protection cannot be bypassed with common techniques.

title: API Authentication and Session Management
description: Verify the modularized authentication API endpoints securely manage user authentication sessions, including session timeout and logout.

steps.description: Authenticate using API endpoint with valid credentials.
Verify session token or cookie is set with secure attributes.
Call API endpoints with and without valid session tokens.
Verify endpoints reject requests without valid authentication.
Trigger logout API.
Verify session invalidation and logout success.
Simulate session timeout and verify user is prompted to login again.

title: Performance with Large Datasets
description: Verify system performance including UI responsiveness, search debounce, and smooth scrolling with 500+ leads.

steps.description: Load leads database with over 500 leads.
Perform search input repeatedly to test debounce.
Verify search executes only after debounce delay and results appear promptly.
Scroll through leads list multiple times.
Verify UI responsiveness is stable and smooth without latency spikes.

title: Installer Shortcut Functionality
description: Verify the installer creates functional shortcuts that launch the application correctly.

steps.description: After installation, click on desktop shortcut.
Verify application launches successfully.
After installation, click on Start Menu shortcut.
Verify application launches successfully.

title: Validation of API Endpoints Structure and Modularity
description: Verify that lead CRUD, authentication, and email parse/sync APIs are modularized and adhere to architectural principles.

steps.description: Review API endpoint files and test each endpoint through automated API tests.
Verify endpoints comply with modular design, respond correctly to requests, and enforce validations.

title: Troubleshooting and Performance Documentation Verification
description: Verify that provided troubleshooting guide and performance docs reflect actual product behavior and aid in issue resolution.

steps.description: Intentionally introduce common errors and performance bottlenecks.
Refer to troubleshooting and performance optimization documents.
Verify documents provide correct steps to diagnose and remediate issues.
